kizuna_health_b_01:
Hey there! Come on in! Everyone’s welcome in
the nurse’s office![VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_b_02:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Hmm. [VAR TRNAME(0000)]! Have you
toughened\r
up\r
a bit?![VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_b_03a:
Oh, so you know you’re tough stuff, huh?
Hahaha. But seriously—you look a bit different![VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_b_03b:
What? No, you definitely have...more confidence
or something![VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_b_04:
I bet it’s because of all the crazy experiences
you’re having on your Treasure Hunt.[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_b_05:
You need to tell me all about what you’ve been
up to![VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_b_07:
I sure am jealous of you kids. You get to try out
new things every single day.[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_b_09: I actually wanted to become a teacher.[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_b_10:
I’m just the school nurse, y’know? I can’t teach
classes or anything like that.[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_b_11:
I couldn’t pass the certification exam to become
an actual health teacher.[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_b_12:
I took it so many times, but no luck. So here I
am...stuck forever in the nurse’s office.[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_b_13:
Oh, uh...sorry. I guess this isn’t a very fun thing to
talk about.[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_b_14:
But you’re just such a good listener! I find myself
telling you all kinds of stuff.[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_b_15:
I hope you’ll still come see me even if I talk your
ear off like this.[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_health_b_system_01: You became even closer with Nurse Miriam!
